Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Milestones.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Grants free access to state parks for firefighters
Summary: Grants free access to state parks for firefighters upon showing a sufficient method of identification, as designated by the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation or other state agency having jurisdiction.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง13.12, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to granting free access to state parks for firefighters
